abstract: Kibbutz of Merom Golan in Golan Heights is experiencing building boom, part of aggressive development goal set by senior Israeli minister Naftali Bennet for100,000 new residents across Golan within five years; many Israeli leaders believe conflict in Syria offers perfect opportunity to solidify control of area.
lead_paragraph: With Syria “disintegrating” after years of civil war, some Israelis argue, it is hard to imagine a stable state to which the territory seized in the 1967 war could be returned.

headline.main: As Syria Reels, Israel Looks to Expand Settlements in Golan Heights
headline.print_headline: As Syria Reels, Israel Takes Steps in Golan

snippet: With Syria “disintegrating” after years of civil war, some Israelis argue, it is hard to imagine a stable state to which the territory seized in the 1967 war could be returned.
